Package org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query

Class GroupsListQuery

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query.GroupsListQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.list.api.ResourceListQuery
public class GroupsListQuery extends org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
Query for the users list. The following filters can be used:
  • name
  • role
  • provider
